hepb_recombivax.name: Recombivax HB
hepb_recombivax.description: Hepatitis B vaccine for prevention of infection caused by all known subtypes of hepatitis B virus. Approved for all ages. 3-dose series.

hepb_engerix.name: Engerix-B
hepb_engerix.description: Hepatitis B vaccine for prevention of infection caused by all known subtypes of hepatitis B virus.

hib_hiberix.name: Hiberix
hib_hiberix.description: Haemophilus b Conjugate Vaccine (Tetanus Toxoid Conjugate) for prevention of invasive disease caused by H. influenzae type b.

hib_acthib.name: ActHIB
hib_acthib.description: Haemophilus b Conjugate Vaccine (Tetanus Toxoid Conjugate) for prevention of invasive disease caused by H. influenzae type b.

hib_pedvaxhib.name: PedvaxHIB
hib_pedvaxhib.description: Haemophilus b Conjugate Vaccine (Meningococcal Protein Conjugate) for prevention of invasive disease caused by H. influenzae type b.

dtap_daptacel.name: Daptacel
dtap_daptacel.description: Diphtheria and Tetanus Toxoids and Acellular Pertussis Vaccine Adsorbed for active immunization against diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis.

dtap_infanrix.name: Infanrix
dtap_infanrix.description: Diphtheria and Tetanus Toxoids and Acellular Pertussis Vaccine Adsorbed for active immunization against diphtheria, tetanus, and pertussis.

ipv_ipol.name: IPOL
ipv_ipol.description: Poliovirus Vaccine Inactivated for active immunization against poliovirus types 1, 2, and 3.

pcv_prevnar13.name: Prevnar 13
pcv_prevnar13.description: Pneumococcal 13-valent Conjugate Vaccine for prevention of invasive disease caused by Streptococcus pneumoniae.

pcv_prevnar20.name: Prevnar 20
pcv_prevnar20.description: Pneumococcal 20-valent Conjugate Vaccine for prevention of invasive disease caused by Streptococcus pneumoniae.

pcv_vaxneuvance.name: Vaxneuvance
pcv_vaxneuvance.description: Pneumococcal 15-valent Conjugate Vaccine for prevention of invasive disease caused by Streptococcus pneumoniae.

rv_rotarix.name: Rotarix
rv_rotarix.description: Rotavirus Vaccine, Live, Oral for prevention of rotavirus gastroenteritis.

rv_rotateq.name: RotaTeq
rv_rotateq.description: Rotavirus Vaccine, Live, Oral, Pentavalent for prevention of rotavirus gastroenteritis.

mmr_mmrii.name: M-M-R II
mmr_mmrii.description: Measles, Mumps, and Rubella Virus Vaccine Live for prevention of measles, mumps, and rubella.

var_varivax.name: Varivax
var_varivax.description: Varicella Virus Vaccine Live for prevention of varicella (chickenpox).

hepa_havrix.name: Havrix
hepa_havrix.description: Hepatitis A Vaccine, Inactivated for prevention of disease caused by hepatitis A virus.

hepa_vaqta.name: Vaqta
hepa_vaqta.description: Hepatitis A Vaccine, Inactivated for prevention of disease caused by hepatitis A virus.

tdap_boostrix.name: Boostrix
tdap_boostrix.description: Tetanus Toxoid, Reduced Diphtheria Toxoid, and Acellular Pertussis Vaccine for booster immunization.

tdap_adacel.name: Adacel
tdap_adacel.description: Tetanus Toxoid, Reduced Diphtheria Toxoid, and Acellular Pertussis Vaccine for booster immunization.

hpv_gardasil9.name: Gardasil 9
hpv_gardasil9.description: Human Papillomavirus 9-valent Vaccine, Recombinant for prevention of HPV-related diseases.

men4_menactra.name: Menactra
men4_menactra.description: Meningococcal (Groups A, C, Y and W-135) Polysaccharide Diphtheria Toxoid Conjugate Vaccine.

men4_menveo.name: Menveo
men4_menveo.description: Meningococcal (Groups A, C, Y and W-135) Oligosaccharide Diphtheria CRM197 Conjugate Vaccine.

men4_menquadfi.name: MenQuadfi
men4_menquadfi.description: Meningococcal (Groups A, C, Y and W) Conjugate Vaccine for prevention of invasive meningococcal disease.

menb_bexsero.name: Bexsero
menb_bexsero.description: Meningococcal Group B Vaccine for prevention of invasive disease caused by Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B.

menb_trumenba.name: Trumenba
menb_trumenba.description: Meningococcal Group B Vaccine for prevention of invasive disease caused by Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B.

ppsv23_pneumovax23.name: Pneumovax 23
ppsv23_pneumovax23.description: Pneumococcal Vaccine Polyvalent for prevention of pneumococcal disease caused by the 23 serotypes.

covid19_comirnaty.name: Comirnaty
covid19_comirnaty.description: COVID-19 mRNA Vaccine for prevention of COVID-19 disease.

den_dengvaxia.name: Dengvaxia
den_dengvaxia.description: Dengue Tetravalent Vaccine, Live for prevention of dengue disease.
